sprint_goal: Establish the project foundation, CI pipeline, and implement the core backend logic for user registration.
Complete the user activation flow and implement a secure, end-to-end login and logout system with JWT session management.
Implement the complete password recovery flow, enable session refreshing, and establish the security audit logging foundation.

Deliver advanced security and account lifecycle features, including MFA setup/login and the full deactivation/deletion/reactivation workflows. (Note: High point total may require splitting this over two sprints).
